shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_init_1=q21 = 1/asin(1);
per_frame_1=wave_r=bass_att-0.5;
per_frame_2=wave_b=mid_att-0.5;
per_frame_3=wave_g=treb_att-0.5;
per_frame_4=cx=(((sin(time/1.9)+1)/2)*0.8)+0.1;
per_frame_5=cy=(((sin(time/3.1)+1)/2)*0.8)+0.1;
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=// coordinates spiral 1
per_frame_8=q21 = .5; //sin(time); // X
per_frame_9=q22 = 0 - sin(time * .5); //-0.5; // Y
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=// coordinates spiral 2
per_frame_12=q23 = 0;
per_frame_13=q24 = 1; //sin(time); //0.5;
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=q25 = 0.5/asin(1); // pi/4
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=q26 = time*0.3; // rotation
per_frame_18=q27 = -time*0.6; // growth
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=
per_frame_21=zoom = zoom + (treb_att * .5);
per_frame_22=mv_r = .5+sin(time);
per_frame_23=mv_b = .5+sin(time*.556677);
per_frame_24=mv_g = .5+sin(time*.353);
per_frame_25=//mv_a = 0;
per_frame_26=//mv_a = 0 + ((treb_att * .005));
per_frame_27=//mv_l = 0 + (treb * .05);
per_frame_28=//mv_l = 0;
per_pixel_1=rot=rad*((sin(time/2)*0.5+0.5)*x);
warp_1=`sampler sampler_worms;
warp_2=`float3 color, mus;
warp_3=`float dx,dy;
warp_4=`shader_body {
warp_5=`float2 uv1 = (uv-.5) * aspect.xy;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`
warp_8=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_9=`float z = 2*length(uv1)+rand_frame * 64;
warp_10=`float2 d = normalize(uv1);
warp_11=`float clp = 2;
warp_12=`float2 rs = clamp(tan(z)*d,-clp,clp);
warp_13=`uv += rs/20;
warp_14=`
warp_15=`
warp_16=`uv6 = .4*sin(uv1*22);
warp_17=`mus = .1/(length(uv6));
warp_18=`mus *= roam_cos;
warp_19=`
warp_20=`float3 blur = GetBlur1(frac(uv));
warp_21=`
warp_22=`float3 crisp= tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
warp_23=`
warp_24=`float3 ret1 = crisp - blur*.04 + .15*mus;
warp_25=`q25 = q24;
warp_26=`ret = q25*(ret1-.02)*.98 + (1-q25)* GetPixel(uv_orig);
warp_27=`}
comp_1=`float2 numerator, denominator, fraction;
comp_2=`
comp_3=`shader_body
comp_4=`{
comp_5=`
comp_6=`/*** Flexis cleaned up Moebius spiral code ***/
comp_7=`
comp_8=`float cutoff = 0.97;
comp_9=`int n = -1;
comp_10=`float s = .5;
comp_11=`
comp_12=`   float2 c = (uv-0.5)*2*aspect.wz;
comp_13=`   numerator = (c + float2(q21,q22))*64;
comp_14=`   denominator = c + float2(q23,q24);
comp_15=`   fraction = float2( numerator.x*denominator.x + numerator.y*denominator.y,
comp_16=`                      numerator.y*denominator.x - numerator.x*denominator.y)/
comp_17=`                      (denominator.x*denominator.x + denominator.y*denominator.y);
comp_18=`   c = fraction-0.5;
comp_19=`   float1 ang_hq = n*atan2(c.x,c.y);
comp_20=`   float2 spiral = float2(ang_hq*q25+q26,s*aspect.w*log(length(c))+ang_hq*q25+q27);
comp_21=`   spiral = 0.5 + (0.5 - abs( frac( spiral * 0.5 ) * 2.0 - 1.0 ))*cutoff; // mirror
comp_22=`
comp_23=`/**********************************************/
comp_24=`
comp_25=`ret = GetPixel(spiral);
comp_26=`//ret = (treb_att * .35) + ret;
comp_27=`
comp_28=`//    ret *= ret + sin(treb_att * .5);
comp_29=`
comp_30=`ret *= 1.40 + (treb_att);
comp_31=`//ret = 0 + (sin(time)) - ret;
comp_32=`}
comp_33=`
